summary: For players that do not have Dawn Guard, this gives them the ability to forge arrows at any blacksmith just like if they did have Dawn Guard. Iron - Daedric.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=44]LOT -- Forgable Arrows[/size][/center]
[size=4]Description[/size]
This small .ESP file allows any player to create arrows at a blacksmith just as they would be able to in the Dawn Guard expansion. For obvious reason, this mod is for those that do [b]NOT[/b] have Dawn Guard. Arrows were usually rather expensive and let's be honest firewood didn't exactly have much in the way of uses.

This mod turns all that around, there's no bonus arrows to make the game that little bit easier, just the good, old, plain vanilla arrows.
[list][*]24 Iron Arrows - 1 Iron Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Steel Arrows - 1 Steel Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Dwarven Arrows - 1 Dwarven Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Elven Arrows - 1 Refined Moonstone Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Orcish Arrows - 1 Orichalcum Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Ebony Arrows - 1 Ebony Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Glass Arrows - 1 Malachite Ingot 1 Firewood
[*]24 Daedric Arrows - 1 Ebony Ingot 1 Firewood 1 Daedric Heart
[/list]
These arrows only unlock if you have the relevant smithing perks! Don't expect to be smithing daedric arrows if you haven't got the perk!

This mod goes extremely well with my other mod for slightly improved wood chopping! Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48891/?]here[/url] to view it.
author: LegendOfThunder
